final-blow.dialog.contentmessage: This is a "FINAL BLOW", decide what to do...
final-blow.chat.messages.specialdead: '{token}' is been killed with something special!
final-blow.setting.obfuscateNPCs.name: Display names
final-blow.setting.obfuscateNPCs.hint: Obfuscate names of certain combatants for players. GM will see names as normal with slightly altered turn announcer card.
final-blow.setting.obfuscateNPCs.obfusca: Player owned or token name visible
final-blow.setting.hidePortrait.name: Hide portraits
final-blow.setting.hidePortrait.hint: Do not include portrait in new chat messages.
final-blow.setting.useIntegrationWithMMM: Use integration with 'Maxwell's Manual of Malicious Maladies'
If checked this module settings will enable the integration with the module 'Maxwell's Manual of Malicious Maladies' if active
final-blow.dialogs.content: This is a "FINAL BLOW", decide what to do...
final-blow.dialogs.onlychat.label: Apply only the chat ?
final-blow.dialogs.onlychat.notes: If checked it will apply only the chat and no active effect on the token
final-blow.setting.reset.name: Reset settings to default
final-blow.setting.reset.label: Reset Settings To Default
final-blow.setting.reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
final-blow.setting.debug.name: Enable debugging
final-blow.setting.debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console
